features.feature: 亲爱的用户，本次更新屏幕录制支持三档分辨率可调节，新增系统声音录制、视频通话美颜和风险应用提示开关，优化状态栏字体图标显示，提升通话功能和横屏场景悬浮球使用体验，优化收藏空间动效流畅性，修复部分场景异常耗电问题，提升系统稳定性和系统安全，推荐您进行更新。
优化状态栏字体图标显示，增大字体字号，加粗图标样式，提高信息识别度。
新增录屏场景录制系统声音开关，视频或语音通话时，支持录制系统声音，录屏更完整，设置路径：设置>辅助功能>屏幕录制>录制系统声音。 新增录屏分辨率自定义功能，支持三挡可调节（480P/720P/1080P），随心选择对应的分辨率进行屏幕录制，录屏更清晰，设置路径：设置>辅助功能>屏幕录制>清晰度选择。
新增视频通话美颜开关，设置路径：设置>通知和状态栏>灵动胶囊>视频美颜。 微信视频通话场景下，新增灵动胶囊形态的视频美颜调级，设置路径：设置>辅助功能>音视频通话增强页面>视频通话美颜。
新增风险应用提示开关，针对已被系统管控的风险应用，关闭开关后应用不再显示风险角标，桌面图标显示更简洁，设置路径：系统管家>病毒查杀>风险提示。
优化通话记录合并功能，通过提示窗设置按联系人合并通话记录，让通话记录界面更简洁。 优化通话录音功能，包括增加录制结束后的通知开关、录音保存记录扩容，让录音更便捷高效。
优化横屏场景悬浮球使用体验，悬浮球停留位置避开前置摄像头区域，界面显示更美观。
优化收藏空间动效流畅性。
修复部分场景异常耗电问题。
提升系统稳定性，让您的手机运行更稳定。

新增设备传感器权限管控功能，您可自行选择是否允许应用获取设备传感器权限，有效管控“摇一摇”广告跳转，设置路径：设置>应用>权限管理>权限>获取设备动作与方向。 新增 USB 连接用户身份认证功能，在选择“传输照片”或“传输文件”时，需要进行身份认证，让您的数据传输更安全。 合入安卓2024年9月安全补丁，增强系统安全性。有关荣耀软件安全更新内容的信息，请访问荣耀官方网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/support/bulletin/2024/9
1. 本次更新不会删除您的用户数据，但仍建议您在更新前做好数据备份。 2. 更多精彩功能介绍，请访问“玩机技巧”应用。 3. 如果您在使用过程中遇到任何问题，请访问“我的荣耀”应用或访问荣耀官方服务网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us 寻求支持。

Dear user, this update introduces Beauty in video calls and a switch for security warnings. In this update, you can record system sound and select from three resolution levels for screen recordings. This release also optimizes the display effect of text on the status bar and enhances the call functionality and the user experience of assistive ball in landscape mode. The smoothness of motion effect in Favorites Space is optimized. Additionally, this update fixes the issue of abnormal power consumption in some scenarios, and improves the system stability and security.
Information recognition is enhanced by increasing the text size and bolding the icons.

You can record system sound during video or voice calls as desired. Try it out by going to: Settings > Accessibility features > Screen recording > Record from system sound. You can select from 480P/720P/1080P for video quality in screen recordings. Try it out by going to: Settings > Accessibility features > Screen recording > Video quality.

You can turn on or turn off Beauty during video calls. Try it out by going to: Settings > Notifications and status bar > Magic Capsule > Beauty. You can turn on or off Beauty for video calls. Try it out by going to: Settings > Accessibility features > Call enhancement > Video Call Beauty.

A switch for security warnings is incorporated. For apps already under system control, the risk badge will no longer be displayed after the switch is turned off, making the home screen icons appear more streamlined. Try it out by going to: System Manager > Virus scan > Risk reminders

You can merge call logs by contacts via prompt window, making the call log interface simpler. Enhances the call recording function by incorporating a notification switch after the recording ends and expanding the capacity for recording records, making recording more convenient and efficient.
Optimizes the user experience of assistive ball in landscape mode, ensuring the assistive ball stays away from the front camera, thereby offering a simpler interface.
Optimizes the smoothness of the motion effect in Favorites Space.
Fixes the issue of abnormal power consumption in some scenarios.
Improves the system stability to make your device run more stably.

You have the option to allow apps to use device’s sensors, enabling the control of "shake-to-open" ads. Try it out by going to: Settings > Apps > Permission manager > Permissions > Device movement and orientation. User authentication is required when using USB connection. A verification or security prompt appears when you select Transfer photos or Transfer files, ensuring safer data transfer. Android security patch (Sept 2024) has been incorporated for system security. For more information about HONOR Security updates, please visit our website https://www.honor.com/global/support/bulletin/2024/9
